replies.author: weiyfan
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-17 22:45
右键编辑你的启动脚本，让我看看里面写了什么
@echo off
:1
title 次元监狱
color f
java -Xms1G -Xmx1G -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -jar [1.8.8]PaperSpigot.jar
pause
goto 1

replies.txt_content:
